title: About
text: Karl Ho is a professor at the University of Texas at Dallas.

title: Research
text:
Karl Ho research interests include:

East Asia politics and policy
Technology
Language Models

title: Personal
text: I am a k9 🐶 person. I don’t despise feline 🙀 but I only appreciate them when they can catch 🐀. 😂

title: Teach
text:
Karl Ho teaches:


EPPS 6302 Methods of Data Collection and Production
EPPS 6356 Data Visualization
EPPS 6354 Information Management
EPPS 6323 Knowledge Mining
PPPE 6v81 Political Economy of Technology in East Asia
